about.intro: I currently attend Saint Cloud State University (SCSU) and work as a developer for the Visualization Lab in SCSU. Being the first member in my family to attend a university, I've faced many obstacles but I have always managed to overcome these challenges! I love to learn and deeply understand new topics. I make unique and simple accessible web apps with the focus of visualization.

projects.title: Nerdboard
projects.projectDesc: Interactive online whiteboard to brainstorm, do homework, or just doddle!

projects.title: Slices of the 4th Dimension!
projects.projectDesc: I am created this app for a Math Talk. The Math Talk expands on the concept of the Conic Sections, where the Conic Sections can describe a higher dimensional shape, in this case a cone. This app shows quadric surfaces, which are cross sections of a 4-D shape. By exposing ourselves as much as possible to these cross sections, could potential help describe a 4D shape!

projects.title: Find a number of length n in the Fibonacci Sequence
projects.projectDesc: Find a number of length 'n' from the Fibonacci Sequence, the app was inspired by a question hosted on ProjectEuler.net.
